test_cases.name: testCheckOneOfParametersRequired_AllParametersMissing
test_cases.description: Tests the scenario where all parameters are missing and expects a BinanceConnectorException.

test_cases.name: testCheckOneOfParametersRequired_OneParameterPresent
test_cases.description: Tests the scenario where one parameter is present and expects no exception.

test_cases.name: testCheckOneOfParametersRequired_AllParametersPresent
test_cases.description: Tests the scenario where all parameters are present and expects no exception.

test_cases.name: testCheckOneOfParametersRequired_NullParams
test_cases.description: Tests the scenario where the params object is null and expects a BinanceConnectorException.
